pinflInfo: JSHSHIR (PINFL) is only for individual entrepreneurs
acceptOffer: I accept the terms of the “public offer”
verifyInfoBeforeConfirm: Make sure the information you entered is correct before confirming
activationCodeSent: An activation code will be sent to your {{email}}
smsCategoriesInfo: All SMS messages on Ucell and Uzmobile mobile operators are divided into two categories: 'Service type' and 'Advertising type'.
serviceSmsInfo: - Service type SMS – this category includes: confirmation code / password / order number; payment and transaction details; alerts about certain events or situations, and other similar information.
advertisingSmsInfo: - Advertising type SMS – this category includes: advertising of products and services; informing subscribers about promotions, discounts, and news; holiday greetings, and other similar information.
areYouSureLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete?
moderationInfo: Before sending any new SMS message, users must submit it for moderation using the “+ Add text” button. There is no need to repeatedly add previously submitted texts.
moderationTime: SMS texts are moderated within 1 hour to 1 business day, excluding holidays and weekends.
originalTextRequirement: To pass moderation, SMS messages must be submitted exactly as they will be sent to the recipient’s mobile number, without any modifications or additions. Any necessary adjustments (such as masking variable parts) will be handled by the moderator.
confirmationCodeRequirement: All SMS messages containing a “confirmation code” must include the resource name (project name, website name, or Telegram bot name) and the purpose of the code. Messages without these details will be rejected by mobile operators.
underModeration: Under moderation - Messages are reviewed within 1 hour to 1 day, excluding weekends and holidays. Please wait. The status will change after moderation.
sentToOperator: Sent to mobile operator - You can send this SMS message while it is in this status.
approvedFromModerator: Approved - The text has been approved by a moderator.
title: Title
confirmEnteredSmsText: I confirm the entered SMS text
readCharacterGuide: I have read the character usage guide for SMS
incorrectAttendanceMessage: Hello, (STUDENT)! You did not attend the (COURSE) class in group (GROUP) at (TIME) – incorrect version
correctAttendanceMessage: Hello, Murad! You did not attend the IELTS class in group 789-A at 11:00 – correct version
incorrectBalanceMessage: Dear #NAME#! Your balance is #CASH# #CASHNAME#. Please top it up on time. – incorrect version
correctBalanceMessage: Dear Tursunov Anvar! Your balance is 32,456.74 UZS. Please top it up on time. – correct version
incorrectOrderMessage: You placed an order on [name] website. Order number: # [order_id]. Amount: [order_total]. Payment upon receipt. – incorrect version
correctOrderMessage: You placed an order on Textup.uz website. Order number: # 447-A. Amount: 143,000 UZS. Payment upon receipt. – correct version
incorrectRegistrationCodeMessage: Confirmation code for registration: 0000 – incorrect version
correctRegistrationCodeMessage: Confirmation code for registration on Textup.uz: 0000 – correct version
correctPasswordResetMessage: Code to reset the password on Textup Media platform: 0000 – correct version
incorrectAppCodeMessage: Do not share this code with anyone! Code for the mobile app: 0000 – incorrect version
correctAppCodeMessage: Do not share this code with anyone! Confirmation code for logging into Textup mobile app: 0000 – correct version
correctOrderConfirmationMessage: Code for order confirmation on Textup.uz website: 0000 – correct version
applicationForAlphaName: Application for opening an Alpha Name **
alphaNameApprovalTime: Mobile operators require 1-2 months to approve an alpha name. *
alphaNameCreationCost: Cost of creating one alpha name: **
perfectumNotAvailable: Perfectum – Alpha Name service is unavailable
paymentNotice: P/S: A separate contract for the Alpha Name is not issued. Payment is made based on the SMS service agreement. When making a payment, specify the purpose: "За организации каналов для передачи SMS-сообщений сог.дог №".
alphaNameRequirements: The Alpha Name must be no more than 11 characters long and should not contain spaces between words. Only Latin letters can be used.
exampleAlphaNamesList: Examples: Textup, ESKIZ, textup, Textup.uz, Eskizuz, EskizUZ, Eskiz_MEDIA, ESKIZ_MEDIA
enterBusinessActivityExample: Website development, hosting, domain registration services
applicationForNik: Application for obtaining an Alpha Name
applicationAcceptedAfterPayment: The application is accepted only after payment. When making a payment, be sure to specify: 'за границей каналов для передачи СМС-сообщений'
enterOrganizationLink: Enter a link to find information about your organization (Telegram channel, website, Telegram bot, Facebook, Instagram)
uploadCertificateOrLicense: Upload your organization's certificate or license
dropFilesHereOrClickToUpload: Drag and drop files in '{{formats}}' format here or click to upload. Max size: {{maxSizeInMB}}MB
uploadNewContactsInfo: To upload new contacts, download the template and fill it out. * All fields must be completed. The number of contacts in the template must not exceed 10,000.
pricesUpdatedMonthly: * Prices may be updated every month
serviceAvailableForSmsGateway: ** The service is available only for the SMS gateway
smsChargeForAllStatuses: ** SMS charges apply to all specified statuses: Delivered, Transferred, Not Delivered
smsCost: Cost of sent SMS messages: SMS (Service Type) 122,920 UZS + SMS (Advertising Type) 0 UZS = 122,920 UZS
smsPaymentInfo: - SMS charges apply for Delivered and Transferred statuses
moderatorCheckStatusInVerify: Your request has been accepted, please wait for the moderator's response.
moderatorCheckStatusActive: Your profile has been verified, go to the login section
smsLengthAndCharacters: SMS length and number of characters:
smsCostInfo: The cost of an SMS is calculated based on its length. An SMS may consist of one or more parts.
latinLetters: - In Latin: if the message is 160 characters long, it's counted as 1 SMS; if more — as 2 SMS.
cyrillicLetters: - In Cyrillic: if the message is up to 70 characters, it's counted as 1 SMS; if more — as 2 SMS.
smsPartsInfo: - One SMS in Cyrillic contains up to 70 characters, two-part up to 134 characters. In Latin — 160 and 306 characters respectively. See the table below for more info.
importantNote1: 1. Latin messages may contain only Latin letters, numbers and allowed characters: ! #%.,:;?/()+-&^?{}[]<>/@#$%^+=~*_'()
importantNote2: 2. If the message contains even one Cyrillic character, the entire message is treated as Cyrillic.
importantNote3: 3. If the text includes the following special characters: « ― », « ` », «(« , »)», « ‘ », « № », « “ ” », « ” », « | », the message is also treated as Cyrillic.
importantNote4: 4. Spaces and punctuation marks are also counted as characters.
yourMessageHasBeenSentSuccessfully: Your message has been sent successfully!
enterEmailForPasswordReset: Enter your email address to receive a verification code
enterEmailAndNewPassword: Enter your email and new password to reset your account
otpSentToEmail: Verification code sent to your email
enterOtpAndNewPassword: Enter the verification code and your new password
deleteAllGroupContacts: Delete all contacts belonging to the group
Group deleted but failed to delete conta: Group deleted but failed to delete contacts
